Description.Text: Ekaterinburg-Tsentralny is a traditional 3-star property offering cosy accommodation in the heart of Ekaterinburg. It boasts historic architecture, elegant interiors and a fine dining restaurant. Ekaterinburg city centre is a vibrant district situated besides the Iset River and steeped in fascinating history. Nearby places of interest include City Hall, the Opera & Ballet House and the Cathedral-on-the-Blood, the site of the former Ipatiev House where the Romanov royal family spent their last months. Ploshchad 1905 Goda metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Ekaterinburg destinations. The hotel occupies a distinguished building designed in a rational modern style. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are decorated in a retro style. Amenities include satellite/cable TV, air-conditioning, a work desk, fridge and an en-suite bathroom. The Savoy restaurant offers refined Russian and European dishes in a traditional setting which retains its early 20th-century style. Guests can enjoy live music and a range of drinks and snacks at the hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour room service.
